txt.en: Inn of the Forsaken: End the Wailing at the Source

The wailing noises people are complaining of are not caused by the wind, but by something much less friendly. If you are to put an end to the noises once and for all, you must locate the source and, if necessary, destroy it.
Defeated the Spirit of the Necklace
Destroy the source of the wailing noises
Locate and destroy the source of the wailing noises.
